'''18w48b''' is the tenth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on November 30, 2018<ref name="18w48b blogpost">{{snap|18w48b|id=b|November 30, 2018}}</ref>, which fixes some bugs in [[18w48a]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=18w48b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|118971|Being only slightly inside solid block in [[Spectator]] Mode makes Sky go dark
|;dev
|139725|Water blocks breaking on world generation (with stone break sound and water particles).
|;prev
|140234|{{code|server-port}} ignored in [[server.properties]].
|140235|Generating chunks and using {{cmd|locate}} causes a datafixer crash.
}}</onlyinclude>
